(iv) 
a.  
For those combining Adult Education with English 
Language, their UTME subjects must include English 
Language, Literature in English and any other Arts 
subject.  
For other combinations, English Language plus any 
other Arts or Science subjects related to one ’s choice 
of combination.  
BENIN  
For Adult Education Professional, it requires any 
three (3) subjects chosen from Arts or Social 
Sciences.
